name: DouDot
description:
Game done for the Quarantine Jam, 

Theme  SPEEDRUN

We are a small team of 3 people, hope you like it!!

DouDot Is a Fast-Paced Platformer where your goal
is to get to the finish line as fast as you can

GAMEPLAY

Run as fast as you can from the Black Hole, Unlock the levels by getting the lowest time possible. Master the levels and challenge the other players!

CONTROLS

-Mouse to look around

-WASD to move around

- Right Mouse Button To Shoot the Grappling Hook

-Shift to Run

-E to Slide

-SpaceBar To Jump
